reviewText:
50 RIGHT-HAND & 3 LEFT-HAND TECHNIQUES (Muriel Anderson) LEVELS Early Intermediate  Late Intermediate
Based on Muriels DVD, 50 Right-Hand Techniques You MUST Know, this course reaches into left-hand techniques as well. It can help you to find more efficient technique and introduces some lesser-known techniques to express your music in a variety of ways. Video software (Windows and Mac) with TrueFires Lesson Player, PIP, full-screen, looping, slow motion, keyboard shortcuts, 150 Minutes of Video & Text Commentary
